title: What is the Time-Life "Ultimate Seventies" font?
content:
Here’s a link to a pic of the font used in the Time-Life “Ultimate Seventies” CD series. I’ve seen this font a million times, but can’t seem to ID it. If anyone can help, I’d be much appreciative:

[http://host.jwcinc.net/3942996/albumart/VA\_-\_Time\_Life-Ultimate\_Seventie...](http://web.archive.org/web/20091214060629/http:/host.jwcinc.net/3942996/albumart/VA_-_Time_Life-Ultimate_Seventies-1975.jpg "http://host.jwcinc.net/3942996/albumart/VA\_-\_Time\_Life-Ultimate\_Seventies-1975.jpg")
author: superbu

comments.content: Heh, that’s a bit of an [LTypI](http://web.archive.org/web/20091214060629/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/ltypi/) there.
